snippet: A North Korean soldier who fled into China and killed four Chinese citizens in late December has died after being injured during an arrest attempt by Chinese security forces, according to reports by Chinese state news organizations.
abstract: North Korean soldier who killed four Chinese citizens in northeast China in late December dies during arrest attempt by Chinese police.
lead_paragraph: A North Korean soldier who fled into China and killed four Chinese citizens in late December has died after being injured during an arrest attempt by Chinese security forces, according to reports by Chinese state news organizations.
